summary: A wellness/knowledge app with quiz functionality. Working on improving the Knowledge page quiz score display.

existing_features.title: On the Knowledge page, remove the existing quiz score display from on top of the 'Take Quiz' button. Instead, render the score inline on the same row as the article/category title, positioned close to the title (e.g., immediately to its right). The score must be formatted as 'X/6' (e.g., '0/6', '4/6'). Next to the score text, display a medal or award icon styled in the app's primary theme color. Only show the score display when a quiz score exists for that category.

new_feature_requests.summary: Knowledge page: Display quiz score near article title in X/6 format with theme-colored medal icons, inline on the same row as the title and Take Quiz button

projectName: Display quiz score inline with article title in X/6 format with theme-colored medal icon
